title: The Red planet, Mars
creator_credit: John Dooley, International Film Bureau and Plymouth Productions
brief_description: Reviews the available knowledge of Mars, discussing the information gained from the Mariner IV probe in relation to surface and atmospheric conditions, temperatures, seasonal changes and possible life.
creator_credit_for_label: John Dooley, International Film Bureau and Plymouth Productions
